table.name: vtiger_bhsshipping
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsshipping` ( `bhsshippingid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsshipping_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsshippingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsshippingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsshippingcf` ( `bhsshippingid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsshippingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
